header.title: Let's Connect!
header.description: Whether you have questions, suggestions, or just want to say hello. Though I'm not a native English speaker, writing and reading may be understandable.

github.title: GitHub
github.description: My code repository and other projects

interests.title: Interests
interests.responseTime: I try to respond within a few days (sometimes I just forget to see my email, phone messages...) - thanks for your patience!

funFact.title: Fun fact
funFact.description: The name 'Mochiemi' comes from 'mochi' (the cute Japanese dessert) + 'emi' (the last letters from my Name 'Tiemi' (ÂçÉÊÅµÁæé) ). I like to use this nickname in most my usernames across the web üç°

form.title: Send me a message
form.description: Prefer to write directly? Use the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.warning: Sorry! This feature is not yet available. To send an email directly, you can click on the left card.

message.label: Your Message
message.placeholder: What would you like to talk about?

validation.required: Please fill in all required fields

form.success: Thank you for your message! I'll get back to you soon.

about.title: About Mochi Lab
about.subtitle: 'Just keep swimming' - Dory, Finding
about.description: Welcome to my creative playground! Mochi Lab is where I experiment with modern web technologies, learn to build reusable components and responsive pages. As a developer I'm constantly learning and improving.
about.techDescription: Stacks and tools I've been acquiring

fact1.title: Cat Lover
fact1.description: As a child I always wanted to have cats, but my mother never allowed it. Today I have 5 beautiful cats and she sometimes calls them 'grandchildren'.

fact2.title: Casual Gamer
fact2.description: I really enjoy games like Pok√©mon, Stardew, Rune Factory, among others. I also really enjoy building or telling stories (hello Rimworld).

fact3.title: Inspiration
fact3.description: I really enjoy using Mods in games (unofficial modifications), and that's what initially inspired me to study programming.

fact4.title: Ex-'Med Student'
fact4.description: For many years I attended medical school. I still really enjoy studying about it (especially pharmacology), but I no longer think about working in practice.

features.title: And what do I do here?

fastNavigation.title: Fast Navigation
fastNavigation.description: I study how to simplify navigation routes and optimized performance

components.title: Component Library
components.description: I build and grow the collection of reusable Vue components with TypeScript

modernDesign.title: Modern Design
modernDesign.description: I try to apply development best practices and create responsive design with CSS and accessibility features

internationalization.title: Internationalization
internationalization.description: While practicing my English I explore techniques to implement i18n
